last_episode_to_air.name: Who's Design Rules?
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the grand finale of My Design Rules, we recap the journey with our three duos and the judges. Then it is the big moment, the winner of My design Rules is announced. Who will it be?

name: My Design Rules
overview: Follow the journey of three dynamic duo teams made up of the top emerging creative talent from the Southern tip of Africa as they compete to transform three empty white-box spaces into designer dream homes, one room at a time.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Three competing design duos battle it out in the name of great design. With less than 2 weeks to complete each room challenge, the pressure is on to impress a panel of industry professionals who choose the next big name in South African interior design.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the season Premiere of My Design Rules, we meet our three competing design duos we also meet the show's esteemed judges. The duos also get to explore the white box apartments that they will design, for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Our design duos meet their clients, editors of some of South Africa's top design magazines. They also get briefed on their first challenge, it's a double challenge, they have to decorate both spare rooms in the next two weeks, only one can be a bedroom.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the spare room challenge, the design duo's rush around doing their finishing touches. But will they finish in time. Also who will be crowned as the winners of challenge one by our panel of judges.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The contestants get briefed on their second challenge, and it is another double challenge, this time they have to design and decorate both bathrooms. Each duo also collaborates with a local designer as part of their challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the bathroom challenge, and things are tense, will all three duos finish this mammoth challenge in time. Also who will be crowned as the winners of challenge two by our panel of judges.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The contestants get briefed on their third challenge, everyone is relieved that they only need to decorate one room in this challenge, but it is one of the most important rooms in a home, the master bedroom.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the master bedroom challenge, one of the duo's is cutting it very fine, while the others are comfortably done with their rooms. Also who will be crowned as the winners of challenge three by our panel of judges.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: It is time for our duos' clients to check their progress, and provide some feedback and suggestions for the rest of the challenges. Also contestants get briefed on their fourth challenge, this time they have to design and decorate the Kitchen.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the kitchen challenge, a disaster befalls one of our duos, will they be able to overcome this in time, the other two duos are also rushing to finish. Who will be crowned as the winners of challenge four by our panel of judges.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The contestants get briefed on their fifth and last challenge, but it is a big one, they have to decorate the living room as well as the patio and remaining nooks, Each duo also collaborates with a local designer as part of their challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the final challenge, the duo's are rushing around to make sure they implement all their ideas. But will they finish in time and who will be crowned as the winners of the final challenge by our panel of judges.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: In this festive episode the duo's get a chance to do some changes or fixes to all of their rooms, before the panel of judges including a familiar guest judge stay in their apartments for the night to get a sense of how livable the designs are.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: In the grand finale of My Design Rules, we recap the journey with our three duos and the judges. Then it is the big moment, the winner of My design Rules is announced. Who will it be?

episodes.name: Meet & Greet
episodes.overview: In the season Premiere of My Design Rules season 2, we meet our three design duos, their magazine editor mentors, and the show's esteemed judges. The teams also get to explore the white box houses that they will design.

episodes.name: Spare Bedroom Challenge
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their first challenge, decorating the spare bedroom within two weeks. They meet with their mentors and collaborate with some local design talent. Host Danilo pops in at the halfway mark to see their progress

episodes.name: Spare Bedroom Winner
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the spare bedroom room challenge. The design duo's rush around adding their finishing touches. One team in particular seems to be in complete chaos. Who will be crowned as the winners of the first challenge?

episodes.name: Spare Room Challenge
episodes.overview: For the second challenge, the design duos must decorate a second spare room, but it may not be a bedroom. Host Danilo checks in to see the progress.

episodes.name: Spare Room Winter
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the second spare room challenge, and things are tense. Will all three duos finish in time? Stay tuned to find out who will be crowned as the winners of challenge two by our panel of judges

episodes.name: Bathroom Challenge
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their third challenge, a double room challenge they must decorate both bathrooms. They meet with their mentors to discuss their ideas. Breaking down walls seems to be the trend for this challenge.

episodes.name: Bathroom Winner
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the double bathroom challenge, Will the designers manage to finish this mammoth task in time? One duo's bathroom is seen as very controversial. Who will be crowned as the winners of challenge three by our panel of judges?

episodes.name: Master Bedroom
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their fourth challenge, decorating the master bedroom. They collaborate with local designers and meet with their mentors.

episodes.name: Master Bedroom Challenge
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the master bedroom challenge, the teams lock host Danilo out of their houses while they scramble to finish. Who will be crowned as the winners of challenge four by our panel of judges?

episodes.name: Kitchen Challenge
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their fifth challenge; they must decorate the kitchen. The design teams also get surprised by a much-needed budget boost.

episodes.name: Kitchen Winner
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the kitchen challenge, and the duos are rushing around to make sure they implement all their ideas. But will they finish in time and who will be crowned as the winners of the kitchen challenge by our panel of judges?

episodes.name: Garden Challenge
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their sixth challenge, this time the gardens need their creative touch. During the first exterior challenge, the design duos have a chance to meet with some local garden gurus.

episodes.name: Garden Winner
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the garden challenge, one duo has a burst pipe close to deadline and another illegally works after deadline, will they be disqualified? Who will be crowned as the winners of the garden challenge by our panel of judges?

episodes.name: Lounge Challenge
episodes.overview: Our design duos get briefed on their seventh and final challenge, decorating the lounge. They meet with their mentors to discuss their ideas

episodes.name: Lounge Winners
episodes.overview: It is deadline day for the final challenge, the lounge. Will team House and Leisure have pulled off a miracle with their miniscule budget? Who will be crowned as the winners of the lounge challenge by our panel of judges?

episodes.name: Judge Sleepover
episodes.overview: The design duos get a chance to fix problems or snags in the whole house. Then it is time for the judges to spend the night in the homes for the final judging process.

episodes.name: Who's Design Rules?
episodes.overview: In the grand finale of My Design Rules, we recap the journey with our three duos and the judges. Then it is the big moment, the winner of My design Rules is announced. Who will it be?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Three competing design duos battle it out in the name of great design. With less than 2 weeks to complete each room challenge, the pressure is on to impress a panel of industry professionals who choose the next big name in South African interior design.
